SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.actors

Class ActiveActorDestructible

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActorDestructible
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
FighterPlane, PowerUp, Projectile
public abstract class ActiveActorDestructible extends ActiveActor implements Destructible
Represents an actor in the game that is both active and destructible. Extends the functionality of ActiveActor and implements the Destructible interface.

      Constructs an ActiveActorDestructible with the specified image and position.
      Parameters:
      imageName - the name of the image file
      imageHeight - the height of the image
      initialXPos - the initial X position
      initialYPos - the initial Y position
